name: Gend'nuit
description:
Why this game ?

This game is the result of a personal frustration: nowhere on the whole Internet were I able to find a game about, or even featuring the French gendarmerie.

So, I decided to create my own !

It is the first time I have tried to make a game, and I learned a lot with it !

Gameplay

In this game, you will choose between different gendarmerie vehicles, and you will visit several maps with predefined scenarios.

To drive the car, use the arrow keys.

To change cars, click on the combobox at the top of the game and check select.

You can rotate the view around the car by dragging the mouse.

To change map, take an exit (right or left).

If you take left on the first map, you will arrive on another map with no exit ; otherwise you can change map by exiting it.

Additional information:

This game is open-source, you can find the source code here
